alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sublette, northwestern Lincoln and southern Teton Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of South Entrance to near Kelly to 6 miles north of Stewart Peak. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kelly around 235 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bondurant and Mariposa Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Star Valley; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Upper Green River Basin Foothills; Yellowstone National Park
